summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Tribeat Ghost Admin Access feature. All core functionalities working correctly: ghost admin link in footer, admin login flow, admin dashboard access, role-based access control (403 for non-admins), and participant sessions page.

issues: Ghost admin link (© 2025 Tribeat) has very low contrast - gray-400 on light background may be hard to see, but this is intentional for 'ghost' access

critical_code_review_comments: Code structure is clean and well-organized
Admin protection is properly implemented via server-side layout check
Middleware correctly delegates /admin protection to layout
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
seed_data_creation: Seed data already exists with 3 users (admin, coach, participant) and 1 demo session
context_for_next_testing_agent: All ghost admin access features tested and working. External preview URL was unavailable during testing (agent resting), but all tests passed using localhost:3000. Key test scenarios covered: 1) Ghost admin link click redirects to login, 2) Admin login works and redirects to dashboard, 3) Non-admin users get 403 when accessing /admin, 4) Participant login redirects to /sessions, 5) All admin sidebar navigation links present and visible.
